p:
Daily precipitation and surface air temperature observations
20 from 2474 China Meteorological Administration (CMA) stations ( http://data.cma.cn/en) were interpolated into 0.5° resolution during 1959–2005. Other meteorological forcings including surface solar radiation, atmospheric humidity, wind speed, and pressure near surface were obtained by using a global observation dataset, the Climatic Research Unit-National Centers for Environmental Prediction version 7 (CRUNCEPv7) data
37 at 0.5° resolution during 1901–2005.
